setting.title: View Proformainvoice
setting.columnlabels: Proforma Invoice No,Date,Customer Name,GSTIN,Director Name,Director Mobile,Director Email Id,Finance Name,Finance Mobile,Finance Email Id,Office Tel no,Office Email Id,Period From,Period To,Subscription Code,Contact Person,Email Id,Mobile No,Billing Address,State,Courier Address,Lead By,Advisory by,Meeting1,Meeting2,Closed By,Terms And Condition,Assigned To,Remarks,status,Taxable Amount,CGST,SGST,IGST,GST,Total Amount
setting.query:
select * from ( select $COLUMNS$, (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_advisorybyid) as employee_employeename2 , (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_meeting1id) as employee_employeename3 , (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_meeting2id) as employee_employeename4 , (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_closedbyid) as employee_employeename5 , (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_employeeid) as employee_employeename6 from tbl_proformainvoice
LEFT JOIN tbl_client ON client_clientid=proformainvoice_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_subscription ON subscription_subscriptionid=proformainvoice_subscriptionid LEFT JOIN tbl_state ON state_stateid=proformainvoice_stateid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_leadbyid LEFT JOIN tbl_setupfortermsandcondition ON setupfortermsandcondition_setupfortermsandconditionid=proformainvoice_setupfortermsandconditionid LEFT JOIN tbl_salesstatus ON salesstatus_salesstatusid=proformainvoice_salesstatusid )mq1 $Search$
